title: Bodysnatchers

lyrics.og: What it is I've done wrong
lyrics.zh: 我究竟是做了什麼錯事

lyrics.og: I have no idea what I am talking about
lyrics.zh: 我不知道自己在說些什麼

lyrics.og: I'm trapped in this body and can't get out
lyrics.zh: 我困在這個軀體裡 無法逃脫

lyrics.og: I have no idea what you are talking about
lyrics.zh: 我不知道你到底在說些什麼

lyrics.og: Your mouth moves only with someone's hand up your arse
lyrics.zh: 你的嘴只在別人的手伸進你屁股時才會動

lyrics.og: Has the light gone out for you?
Because the light's gone out for me
lyrics.zh: 因為我已經沒有希望了

lyrics.og: It can follow you like a dog
lyrics.zh: 它能像條狗一樣跟著你

lyrics.og: It brought me to my knees
They got a skin and they put me in
lyrics.zh: 他們給我套上了一層皮

lyrics.og: They got a skin and they put me in
lyrics.zh: 他們給我套上了一層皮

lyrics.og: On the lines wrapped 'round my face
On the lines wrapped 'round my face

lyrics.zh: 我早就料到這一切會到來了

notes: 這首歌收錄在Radiohead的專輯In Rainbows中。這首歌是在一棟叫Tottenham House的老屋子裡錄製的，屋子的環境很糟，還有傳言說那裡鬧鬼，主唱Thom說製作人是想藉此刺激他們去創作。Thom說這首歌是被恐怖電影<The Stepford Wives>舊版啟發的。電影在講Stepford鎮裡的主婦們被機器人替代的故事
